verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Idigo mee devudani yuda pattanamulaku prakatinchudi Prabhuvagu mana yesu thane shakthi sampannudai thwaraga vatchunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Premaga matladudi yerushalemutho Na janulanu odarchudi Aame dosharunamu theerchabadenani Rendinthalu prathifalamu pondenani{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sarva sareerulu gaddivantivare Adavi puvvu vantide vari andamu Gaddiyendi dani puvvu vadipovunu Mana devuni vakyamu nithyamu niluchunani{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mana devuni margamunu siddhaparachudi Saralamu cheyudi rajamargamu Mana yesu mahimatho bayalupadunu Sarva sareerulu dani chuchedaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shramananubhavinchudi manchi sainikulai Chikkukonakudi jeevana vyaparamulalo Niyama prakaramu poradudi Kireetamunu pondi yelutakai{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devudu mee prathi avasaramunu theerchunu Thana ishwaryamu choppuna kreesthu yesulo Preethikaramaina seva cheyudamu Devunike mahima yuga yugamulaku{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Suvarthanu prakatinchu O seeyonu Unnatha parvathamunu yekkumu Suvarthanu prakatinchu yerushalema Nee yuddhakalamu samapthamayenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Upadesinchumu sariga Satyavakyamu Yogyuniga siggupadani panivaniga Bahumanamutho vatchunu yejamanudu Avidheyatha choopaku darshanamunaku{/lang-eng}
